poke_power.name: Heat Up
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may count the total number of Energy cards attached to all of your Pokémon and all of your opponent’s Pokémon. If your opponent has more total Energy cards attached, you may search your deck for 1 {R} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon, if any. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can’t be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
